virtual const char* rev::CoreEngine::className ( ) const
inlinevirtual

The name of this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its name

◆ getGLWidgetContext()

QOpenGLContext * rev::CoreEngine::getGLWidgetContext ( )

Set the current OpenGL context to the main GL widget context.

Context must be set before creating a VAO, since they are not shared between contexts

◆ namespaceName()

virtual const char* rev::CoreEngine::namespaceName ( ) const
inlinevirtual

The full namespace for this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its full namespace. The built in logging methods will use this value for the message category

Reimplemented from rev::Object.
